duplication.message: msg = "sexp_to_#{File.extname(node.file).sub(/./, "")}" self.respond_to?(msg) ? (self.send(msg, node)) : (sexp_to_rb(node)) msg = "sexp_to_#{File.extname(s.file).sub(/./, "")}" self.respond_to?(msg) ? (self.send(msg, s)) : (sexp_to_rb(s))

opts.on("-m", "--mass MASS", Integer, "Sets mass threshold (default = #{options[:mass]})") do |m| options[:mass] = m.to_i end opts.on("-t", "--timeout TIME", Integer, "Set the timeout. (default = #{options[:timeout]})") do |t| options[:timeout] = t.to_i end

def add_expr_literal(src, code) if code.=~(BLOCK_EXPR) then ((src << "@output_buffer.append= ") << code) else (((src << "@output_buffer.append=(") << code) << ");") end end def add_expr_escaped(src, code) if code.=~(BLOCK_EXPR) then ((src << "@output_buffer.safe_append= ") << code) else (((src << "@output_buffer.safe_append=(") << code) << ");") end end
